definitions.definition: The deteriorated state of iron or steel as a result of moisture and oxidation ; it consists mostly of iron(III) oxide ( ferric oxide ) and iron(II) oxide ( ferrous oxide ).
examples: The rust on my bicycle chain made cycling to work very dangerous.

definitions.definition: A similar substance based on another metal.
A disease of plants caused by a reddish-brown fungus .
Damage caused to stamps and album pages by a fungal infection.

main_definition: The deteriorated state of iron or steel as a result of moisture and oxidation ; it consists mostly of iron(III) oxide ( ferric oxide ) and iron(II) oxide ( ferrous oxide ).
secondary_definitions: A similar substance based on another metal.
A disease of plants caused by a reddish-brown fungus .
( philately ) Damage caused to stamps and album pages by a fungal infection.
